item.description:
What do you seek?Â  Whatever it is, you have your own name for it--truth, peace, love, happiness, freedom--but something inside you holds to a hope that there is an answer to life's endless twists and turns. Somewhere there is divine sense, a purpose. You just want to know what it is.

You have found the call of Soul.

Join us for an informal workshop where we discuss the Call of Soul, how to hear it, learn from it, and follow it for greater spiritual freedom in your life. Participants will try exercises and techniques to open the heart to access the answers that lie within.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Avon room, first room on the right when you start down the hall

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Free Workshop on the Call of Soul
